{{SupportPage|vendor=USRobotics|vs_id=8011}} This device appears to be manufactured by '''AMIT'''. :12VDC power compared to 5V used by comparable early '''Accton''' devices :00:50:18 OUI in sample WAN MAC in the USR ''manual'' The sample SSID shown in the ''manual'' is '''default''', but the manual also specifies the default SSID as '''WLAN'''.. The default password is ''blank''.
